description: The main character, Naoyuki Asaba is usually a relatively quiet boy who spends time with his close friends most of the time. http://anidb.net/ch25697 [His] http://anidb.net/ch25698 [parents] own a hair salon, and Naoyuki himself is able to cut hair. A member of the http://anidb.net/ch25694 [school newspaper club], he spent the previous summer keeping a watch out for UFOs near a local military base with http://anidb.net/ch6964 [the club`s chairman] for company. At the beginning of the school year, he meets the new transfer student, http://anidb.net/ch6961 [Iriya Kana], and quickly forms a crush on her. Naoyuki usually tries his best to be assertive when needed, but is also very sensitive and cries several times throughout the series.
name: Asaba Naoyuki
